page.title: 10SCHOOLS IN THE DISTRICT.
page.content: There are three primary schools in the area. They are for children up to the age of 11 from Grassmoor, Heath and Temple Normanton. All the schools are over a hundred years old. Nursery classes have just been opened at Heath and Grassmoor. Children can start in the nursery after they are 3 years old. At the moment Grassmoor School is getting bigger while fewer children are starting at the other schools because of 'falling rolls'. At Grassmoor there are usually about 30 children in each class grouped by age. When the children leave the primary schools they mainly go to Deincourt or Heath Schools which are for children over ll years of age. Some children go to the secondary schools at Hasland, or Tupton or Tibshelf.
